scripts.dev:db:start: docker compose -p gtd-xxvi-website-dev -f docker/development/docker-compose.yaml up -d db
scripts.dev:db:stop: docker compose -p gtd-xxvi-website-dev -f docker/development/docker-compose.yaml down db
scripts.dev:db:init: pnpm dev:db:push && pnpm dev:prisma db execute --file prisma/init-1-gtdfest.sql && pnpm dev:prisma db execute --file prisma/init-2-merch.sql && pnpm dev:prisma db execute --file prisma/init-3-events.sql
scripts.dev:build:push: docker buildx build --platform=linux/amd64 --provenance=mode=max --sbom=true --cache-from=type=local,src=.dockercache/development/amd64,tag=latest --cache-to=type=local,mode=max,dest=.dockercache/development/amd64,tag=latest,image-manifest=true,oci-mediatypes=true,compression=zstd,compression-level=9 -f docker/development/web.Dockerfile . && docker buildx build --platform=linux/arm64 --provenance=mode=max --sbom=true --cache-from=type=local,src=.dockercache/development/arm64,tag=latest --cache-to=type=local,mode=max,dest=.dockercache/development/arm64,tag=latest,image-manifest=true,oci-mediatypes=true,compression=zstd,compression-level=9 -f docker/development/web.Dockerfile . && docker buildx build --platform=linux/amd64,linux/arm64 --provenance=mode=max --sbom=true --cache-from=type=local,src=.dockercache/development/amd64,tag=latest --cache-from=type=local,src=.dockercache/development/arm64,tag=latest -f docker/development/web.Dockerfile --push -t devpintugtd/gtd-xxvi-website-dev:latest .
scripts.push:docker: docker buildx build --platform=linux/amd64 --provenance=mode=max --sbom=true --cache-from=type=local,src=.dockercache/production/amd64,tag=latest --cache-to=type=local,mode=max,dest=.dockercache/production/amd64,tag=latest,image-manifest=true,oci-mediatypes=true,compression=zstd,compression-level=9 -f docker/production/Dockerfile . && docker buildx build --platform=linux/arm64 --provenance=mode=max --sbom=true --cache-from=type=local,src=.dockercache/production/arm64,tag=latest --cache-to=type=local,mode=max,dest=.dockercache/production/arm64,tag=latest,image-manifest=true,oci-mediatypes=true,compression=zstd,compression-level=9 -f docker/production/Dockerfile . && docker buildx build --platform=linux/amd64,linux/arm64 --provenance=mode=max --sbom=true --cache-from=type=local,src=.dockercache/production/amd64,tag=latest --cache-from=type=local,src=.dockercache/production/arm64,tag=latest -f docker/production/Dockerfile --push -t devpintugtd/gtd-xxvi-website:latest .
